com.dotmarketing.portlets.chains.business

Interface ChainFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChainFactoryImpl

    public interface ChainFactory
    Author:
    davidtorresv

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteChain(Chain chain)
      Removes a chain and all its related states from the database
      void deleteChainLinkCode(ChainLinkCode link)
      Deletes a link from the database an also look for all the possible states that reference the link and also delete them from the db as well
      void deleteChainState(ChainState state)
      This method deletes a chain state from the db and takes cares of reorganizing other states to compact the order and not leave holes
      void deleteChainStateParameter(ChainStateParameter p)
      Deletes the given state parameter from db
      java.util.List<ChainLinkCode> findAllChainLinkCodes()
      It queries the db and retrieve all the configured chain links codes
      java.util.List<Chain> findAllChains()
      It queries the db and retrieve all the configured chains
      Chain findChain(long chainId)
      Tries to look for the chain object directly in db returns null if doesn't find it
      Chain findChainByKey(java.lang.String chainKey)
      Tries to look for the chain object directly in db returns null if doesn't find it
      ChainLinkCode findChainLinkCode(long chainLinkCodeId)
      This method performs a database lookup for the chain link code given the chain link code id.
      ChainLinkCode findChainLinkCodeByClassName(java.lang.String fullyQualifiedClassName)
      Queries searching for chain link code by its fullyquelified class name Only one class (fully qualified) can leave on the links class loader
      java.util.List<ChainState> findChainLinkCodeStates(ChainLinkCode link)
      Return the list of states that are using the given ChainLinkCode, this method goes to DB directly
      ChainState findChainState(long stateId)
      Tries to look for the chain object directly in db by its id
      java.util.List<ChainStateParameter> findChainStateParameters(ChainState state)
      This method performs a database lookup for the parameters associated to a given state of the chain.
      java.util.List<ChainState> findChainStates(Chain chain) 
      java.util.List<Chain> findDependentChains(ChainLinkCode chainLinkCode)
      This method performs a database lookup for the chain link code given the chain link code id.
      Chain loadChain(long chainId)
      Tries to look for the chain on cache if doesn't find it, it uses @see findChain returns null if doesn't find it
      Chain loadChainByKey(java.lang.String chainKey)
      Tries to look for the chain on cache if doesn't find it, it uses @see findChainByKey
      ChainLinkCode loadChainLinkCode(long chainLinkCodeId)
      This method returns the chain link code given the chain link code id, this method tries to load from cache first if not in cache uses the @see findChainLinkCode
      java.util.List<ChainStateParameter> loadChainStateParameters(ChainState state)
      This method returns the parameters associated to the given state on the chain, this method tries to load from cache first if not in cache uses the @see loadChainLinkParameters
      java.util.List<ChainState> loadChainStates(Chain chain) 
      void saveChain(Chain chain)
      Saves/update a chain in the database
      void saveChainLinkCode(ChainLinkCode link)
      Saves/updates a chain link from the database
      void saveChainState(ChainState state)
      This method save and chain state into the database and also takes care of reordering other states so orders are not overlapped
      void saveChainStateParameter(ChainStateParameter p)
      Saves the given chain state parameter in db
